snippet.title: Revenge of Anubis Pyramid Adventure Side Scrolling Game Trailer
snippet.description:
I enjoy developing my own video games when I am not making oil paintings. Here is my latest available for download on Google Play for Android. Inspired by a drawing I did at age 11, play as Anubis as he tries to enter the Great Pyramid and save Egypt from Sets evil reign. Still has a few bugs but hope to have this as an ongoing project with new features added in the future.

Play store link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.doarts.org.roa
